title: Floating objects in the open ocean: Unveiling modifications of the pelagic habitat induced by forest cover change and climate variations
content:
Publication date: September 2024

Source: Global Environmental Change, Volume 88

Author(s): Amaël Dupaix, Matthieu Lengaigne, Marco Andrello, Nicolas Barrier, Laurent Dagorn, Quentin Gusmai, Gaëlle Viennois, Manuela Capello
